definition: Elephant Trunk Hill in Guilin, Guangxi
elephant/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/shape/form/appearance/to imitate
nose
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The elephant mountain, it's the symbol of the city.
sentences.chinese: 象鼻山，是这个城市的象征。

sentences.english: Elephant Trunk Hill juts out into the Li River where it joins the Peach Blossom River.
sentences.chinese: 象鼻山在漓江与桃花河交汇处突兀地显现出来。

sentences.english: It is the Elephant Trunk Hill. It looks like an elephant drinking water with its long trunk.
sentences.chinese: 那是象鼻山，看起来像一头正用鼻子吸水的大象。

sentences.english: No wonder it takes the name "Elephant Hill".
sentences.chinese: 难怪人们都叫它“象鼻山”。

sentences.english: Cheung Pei Shan is the right, look at this as what a mountain?
sentences.chinese: 对了是象鼻山，再看这一座山像什么？
